com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.config.prefs

Class Preferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.config.prefs.Preferences

  • public class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object

    Bean object for user preferences. Intended to be serialized/deserialized by Jackson into/from JSON.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Calvin Goodrich
